definition[0]: the time of day when the sun disappears and night begins
example[0]: We take the flag down at sunset.
definition[1]: the coloured part of the sky where the sun is disappearing at the end of the day
definition[2]: no longer very profitable or important and based on old TECHNOLOGIES
example[2]: As their profit levels fall, these new industries, in their turn, will become sunset sectors.
definition[3]: sunset rules or laws are ones which cancel rules or laws that were made in the past
example[3]: The new sunset law will eliminate statutes that are more than 10 years old.
example[4]: Thesunset provisions will cancel most tax increases since June 30.
